citances.sentence: 37 A convenient summary of the relevant authorities on the question of absorption can be found in the decision of Branson J in Charlie v Minister for Immigration and Citizenship [2008] FCA 1025 ; (2008) 171 FCR 44 at [22] - [34].

I also respectfully agree with these observations made by his Honour and propose to follow the approach taken by his Honour in Johnson [2004] FCA 137 ; 136 FCR 494. This approach was expressly approved by a Full Court of this Court in Moore v Minister for Immigration and Citizenship [2007] FCAFC 134 ; (2007) 161 FCR 236 at [49] to [56] (pp 247---249) and by Branson J in Charlie v Minister for Immigration and Citizenship [2008] FCA 1025 ; (2008) 171 FCR 44 at [31] and [32].
